com.github.katjahahn.parser.optheader

Class OptionalHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.parser.Header<OptionalHeaderKey>
      • com.github.katjahahn.parser.optheader.OptionalHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PEModule

    public class OptionalHeader
extends Header<OptionalHeaderKey>
    Represents the optional header of the PE file.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OptionalHeader.MagicNumber
      The magic number of the PE file, indicating whether it is a PE32, PE32+ or ROM file

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_SIZE
      Maximum size of the optional header to read all values safely is 240

                         long offset)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Creates and returns a new instance of the optional header.
        Parameters:
        headerbytes - the bytes that make up the optional header
        offset - the file offset to the beginning of the optional header
        Returns:
        instance of the optional header
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if headerbytes can not be read

      • maybeGetStandardFieldEntry

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<StandardField> maybeGetStandardFieldEntry(StandardFieldEntryKey key)
        Returns maybe the standard field entry for the given key. If the file is a PE32+, it will not have a base of data field and return absent for the base of data key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the standard field
        Returns:
        the standard field entry for the given key
